text: Diamonds () is a 1937 German mystery film directed by Eduard von Borsody and starring Hansi Knoteck, Viktor Staal, and Hilde Körber. The film's sets were designed by the art director Walter Röhrig. Location shooting took place in Amsterdam and Hamburg. ==Cast== == References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:1937 films Category:1937 mystery films Category:German films Category:Films of Nazi Germany Category:German mystery films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Eduard von Borsody Category:German black-and-white films Category:UFA films Category:Films set in Amsterdam Category:Films shot in Amsterdam
title: Diamonds (1937 film)
